Satisfactory (2pts): Most of the answers are correct.

Needs Work (1pt): Not full english sentences, difficult to read. Either english or code portions of the response are missing.
Satisfactory (2pts): Few grammatical or spelling errors but clarity of overall writing is acceptable. Statements made are attempted or partially linked directly to displayed output.
Proficient (3 pts): Well thought out and clearly stated answers to all problems. All statements made in answer are clearly linked to displayed output.

Needs Work (1pt): Difficult to find problems, no formatting used, code and responses disjoint.
Proficient (3 pts): Easy to navigate, visually clean and organized. R output aligned with content.
